Wracky Dolls
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Monster Types: Wracky: Wracky Dolls
By Anonymous on Tuesday, August 14, 2001 - 09:42 pm:

I accidentaly didn't keep my original doll, and never used it as a seasoning, so I was wondering if it is possibble to get another wracky doll?

All Help is appreciated

By Nightdagger on Wednesday, August 15, 2001 - 02:45 am:

If you didn't keep your original Wracky doll, you should get another one in the mail shortly. You don't use it as a secret seasoning though, Colt stashes it away and the week after that it moves. She puts it away again, and then the next time one of your monsters dies, it comes to life as Wracky.

Anyway, I've thrown my original doll out before, you do get another one in the mail, so don't worry, you haven't ruined your chances to get Wracky.

By torey_luvullo on Wednesday, August 15, 2001 - 06:36 am:

nightdagger is correct. the wracky doll is truly a gift you "cannot refuse".
